## For Maintainers

**Triage Priority:**
- [ ] P0 - Critical, fix immediately
- [ ] P1 - High, fix this sprint
- [ ] P2 - Medium, fix next sprint  
- [ ] P3 - Low, fix when capacity allows

**Root Cause Analysis:**
- [ ] Database issue
- [ ] API logic error
- [ ] Frontend bug
- [ ] Third-party service (SendGrid, Supabase)
- [ ] Configuration issue
- [ ] User error/training needed

**Fix Complexity:**
- [ ] Simple (< 1 day)
- [ ] Medium (1-3 days)
- [ ] Complex (1+ weeks)
- [ ] Requires investigation
